note.p: Birth: Kirchhosbach, Hesse Cassel, Germany (06 September 1829)
Career: Went to England; Chemist, Allsopp's Brewery, Burton-on-Trent (from 1861); discovered diazo compounds; died of apoplexy
From Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB (MP); DSB
E Yates and A Yates ' Johann Peter Griess (1829-88) Victorian Brewer and synthetic dye chemist.' in N&R, Vol 70 Issue 1, March 2016, pp 65-82
